description: Free images and videos you can use anywhere

args.name: apiKey
args.info: Your Pixabay API key.

args.name: query
args.info: A URL encoded search term. If omitted, all images are returned. This value may not exceed 100 characters. Example: `yellow+flower`

args.name: lang
args.info: Language code of the language to be searched in. Accepted values: `cs, da, de, en, es, fr, id, it, hu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, sk, fi, sv, tr, vi, th, bg, ru, el, ja, ko, zh`. Default: `en`

args.name: id
args.info: ID, hash ID, or a comma separated list of values for retrieving specific images. In a comma separated list, IDs and hash IDs cannot be used together.

args.name: highResolution
args.info: Choose between retrieving high resolution images and image details. When selecting details, you can access images up to a dimension of 960 x 720 px.

args.name: orientation
args.info: Whether an image is wider than it is tall, or taller than it is wide. Accepted values: `all`, `horizontal`, `vertical`. Default: `all`

args.name: category
args.info: Accepted values: `fashion`, `nature`, `backgrounds`, `science`, `education`, `people`, `feelings`, `religion`, `health`, `places`, `animals`, `industry`, `food`, `computer`, `sports`, `transportation`, `travel`, `buildings`, `business`, `music`

args.name: minWidth
args.info: Minimum image width. Default: `0`

args.name: minHeight
args.info: Minimum image height. Default: `0`

args.name: editorsChoice
args.info: Select images that have received an Editor's Choice award. Accepted values: `true`, `false`. Default: `false`

args.name: safesearch
args.info: A flag indicating that only images suitable for all ages should be returned. Accepted values: `true`, `false`. Default: `false`

args.name: order
args.info: How the results should be ordered. Accepted values: `popular`, `latest`. Default: `popular`

args.name: page
args.info: Returned search results are paginated. Use this parameter to select the page number. Default: `1`

args.name: perPage
args.info: Determine the number of results per page. Accepted values: `3 - 200`. Default: `20`
